verses.verse: עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> is come up מֵפִ֛יץ <WH6327> He that dasheth in pieces עַל־ <WH5921> against פָּנַ֖יִךְ <WH6440> before thy face נָצ֣וֹר <WH5341> keep מְצֻרָ֑ה <WH4694> the munition צַפֵּה־ <WH6822> watch דֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> the way חַזֵּ֣ק <WH2388> strong מָתְנַ֔יִם <WH4975> make [thy] loins אַמֵּ֥ץ <WH553> fortify כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> [thy] power מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> mightily

כִּ֣י <WH3588> though שָׁ֤ב <WH7725> hath turned away יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> the excellency יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob כִּגְא֖וֹן <WH1347> as the excellency יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֤י <WH3588> though בְקָקוּם֙ <WH1238> for the emptiers בֹּֽקְקִ֔ים <WH1238> have emptied them out וּזְמֹרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2156> their vine branches שִׁחֵֽתוּ׃ <WH7843> and marred

מָגֵ֨ן <WH4043> The shield גִּבֹּרֵ֜יהוּ <WH1368> of his mighty men מְאָדָּ֗ם <WH119> is made red אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> the warriors חַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> the valiant מְתֻלָּעִ֔ים <WH8529> [are] in scarlet בְּאֵשׁ־ <WH784> [shall be] with flaming פְּלָד֥וֹת <WH6393> torches הָרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> the chariots בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day הֲכִינ֑וֹ <WH3559> of his preparation וְהַבְּרֹשִׁ֖ים <WH1265> and the fir trees הָרְעָֽלוּ׃ <WH7477> shall be terribly shaken

בַּֽחוּצוֹת֙ <WH2351> in the streets יִתְהוֹלְל֣וּ <WH1984> shall rage הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> The chariots יִֽשְׁתַּקְשְׁק֖וּן <WH8264> they shall justle one against another בָּרְחֹב֑וֹת <WH7339> in the broad ways מַרְאֵיהֶן֙ <WH4758> they shall seem כַּלַּפִּידִ֔ם <WH3940> like torches כַּבְּרָקִ֖ים <WH1300> like the lightnings יְרוֹצֵֽצוּ׃ <WH7323> they shall run

יִזְכֹּר֙ <WH2142> He shall recount אַדִּירָ֔יו <WH117> his worthies יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> they shall stumble [בַהֲלִכֹותָם כ] (בַּהֲלִֽיכָתָ֑ם <WH1979> company ק) יְמַֽהֲרוּ֙ <WH4116> they shall make haste חֽוֹמָתָ֔הּ <WH2346> to the wall וְהֻכַ֖ן <WH3559> shall be prepared הַסֹּכֵֽךְ׃ <WH5526> thereof and the defence
שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> The gates הַנְּהָר֖וֹת <WH5104> of the rivers נִפְתָּ֑חוּ <WH6605> shall be opened וְהַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> and the palace נָמֽוֹג׃ <WH4127> shall be dissolved

וְהֻצַּ֖ב <WH5324> And Huzzab גֻּלְּתָ֣ה <WH1540> shall be led away captive הֹֽעֲלָ֑תָה <WH5927> she shall be brought up וְאַמְהֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH519> and her maids מְנַֽהֲגוֹת֙ <WH5090> shall lead כְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> [her] as with the voice יוֹנִ֔ים <WH3123> of doves מְתֹפְפֹ֖ת <WH8608> tabering עַל־ <WH5921> on לִבְבֵהֶֽן׃ <WH3824> upon their breasts

וְנִינְוֵ֥ה <WH5210> But Nineveh כִבְרֵֽכַת־ <WH1295> like a pool מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of water מִ֣ימֵי <WH3117> [is] of old הִ֑יא <WH1931> he וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like נָסִ֔ים <WH5127> yet they shall flee away עִמְד֥וּ <WH5975> Stand עֲמֹ֖דוּ <WH5975> stand וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no מַפְנֶֽה׃ <WH6437> [shall they cry] but none shall look back

בֹּ֥זּוּ <WH962> Take ye the spoil כֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> of silver בֹּ֣זּוּ <WH962> take the spoil זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there קֵ֙צֶה֙ <WH7097> for [there is] none end לַתְּכוּנָ֔ה <WH8498> of the store כָּבֹ֕ד <WH3519> [and] glory מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> every כְּלִ֥י <WH3627> furniture חֶמְדָּֽה׃ <WH2532> out of all the pleasant

בּוּקָ֥ה <WH950> She is empty וּמְבוּקָ֖ה <WH4003> and void וּמְבֻלָּקָ֑ה <WH1110> and waste וְלֵ֨ב <WH3820> and the heart נָמֵ֜ס <WH4549> melteth וּפִ֣ק <WH6375> smite together בִּרְכַּ֗יִם <WH1290> and the knees וְחַלְחָלָה֙ <WH2479> and much pain בְּכָל־ <WH3605> the whole מָתְנַ֔יִם <WH4975> [is] in all loins וּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> and the faces כֻלָּ֖ם <WH3605> and all קִבְּצ֥וּ <WH6908> of them all gather פָארֽוּר׃ <WH6289> blackness

אַיֵּה֙ <WH346> Where מְע֣וֹן <WH4583> Where [is] the dwelling אֲרָי֔וֹת <WH738> of the lions וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <WH4829> and the feedingplace ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַכְּפִרִ֑ים <WH3715> of the young lions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after הָלַךְ֩ <WH1980> walked אַרְיֵ֨ה <WH738> where the lion לָבִ֥יא <WH3833> [even] the old lion שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it גּ֥וּר <WH1482> whelp אַרְיֵ֖ה <WH738> [and] the lion's וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> nothing מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none made [them] afraid

אַרְיֵ֤ה <WH738> The lion טֹרֵף֙ <WH2963> did tear in pieces בְּדֵ֣י <WH1767> enough גֹֽרוֹתָ֔יו <WH1484> for his whelps וּמְחַנֵּ֖ק <WH2614> and strangled לְלִבְאֹתָ֑יו <WH3833> for his lionesses וַיְמַלֵּא־ <WH4390> and filled טֶ֣רֶף <WH2964> with prey חֹרָ֔יו <WH2356> his holes וּמְעֹֽנֹתָ֖יו <WH4585> and his dens טְרֵפָֽה׃ <WH2966> with ravin

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold אֵלַ֗יִךְ <WH413> I am against נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> Behold I [am] against thee saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְהִבְעַרְתִּ֤י <WH1197> and I will burn בֶֽעָשָׁן֙ <WH6227> in the smoke רִכְבָּ֔הּ <WH7393> her chariots וּכְפִירַ֖יִךְ <WH3715> thy young lions תֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> shall devour חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> and the sword וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> and I will cut off מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> from the earth טַרְפֵּ֔ךְ <WH2964> thy prey וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> shall no more be heard ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer ק֥וֹל <WH6963> and the voice מַלְאָכֵֽכֵה׃ <WH4397> of thy messengers ס
